value:
Dear Goddess, I ask for guidance...
And for protection...

My apologies if I cause you any
trouble, summoner.

I spend most of my time looking after
animals and praying to the goddess...

I'm not good at talking to others. I
can talk to a pegasus or a horse just
fine. But if it's a person, I freeze up.

Um, did you need something
from me?

This is, um...a gift for you from your
friend. I just came to deliver it.
I wonder how much more I can learn.
I guess I feel a little stronger.
Um... Oh well.

OK, I've got it now. I'll try to put
this to use.
Sorry...you're stuck with me.

I-is this a good time? I, um... I wanted
to thank you. You always watch out
for me. It's very encouraging.$k$pI've never been good at talking to
people. I'm actually much more
comfortable with horses and birds.$k$pIt's not that I'm disinterested in
people. I just...freeze up. It makes
others uncomfortable around me.$k$pIt's because of my adoptive father
that I went to the Officers Academy
and made friends, but...$k$pI'm sorry—I'm starting to ramble.
I wanted to ask you... Is it OK if
I stay here in Askr?$k$pI-it is? I'm glad. Everyone here is
so nice. Staying here really means a
lot to me, $Nu.$k$pI never dreamed I'd come this far.
Thank you again for your guidance.
えいっ
はあっ
ああっ
いやあああ…
My blood compels me!
I'm sorry!
Keep away from me!
Stay back!
I wasn't able to help...
えっ…
I'm M-Marianne von Edmund...
Eeek! Oh...my apologies. I was distracted talking to my bird friend...
My adoptive father is a noble with territory in the north of the Alliance. Oh, um...you seem surprised to learn that I was adopted.
I wonder... What is my purpose here? How can I make myself useful to others?
P-Please forgive me...I'm not used to speaking so openly.
Dear Goddess, I ask for guidance...
When I'm with you...I feel at ease. I would like to continue working by your side. That is, um, if you don't mind, of course.
Who, me?
Is now good?
Um. OK...
